test_cases.description: Test that main successfully fetches and displays users when UserService operates normally.
test_cases.name: test_fetch_all_users_success

test_setup.given: UserService.fetch_all_users returns a non-empty list of users; no exceptions are raised.
test_setup.then: Users are displayed via display_users, and no errors are logged.

test_cases.description: Test that main displays an empty list if no users are found.
test_cases.name: test_fetch_all_users_returns_empty_list

test_setup.given: UserService.fetch_all_users returns an empty list; no exceptions are raised.
test_setup.then: display_users is called with an empty list, and no errors are logged.

test_cases.description: Test that main logs an error if UserService.fetch_all_users throws an exception.
test_cases.name: test_fetch_all_users_raises_exception

test_setup.given: UserService.fetch_all_users raises a generic Exception with message 'DB Error'.
test_setup.then: Error 'Failed to retrieve users: DB Error' is logged, and display_users is not called.

test_cases.description: Test that main logs an error if display_users raises an exception when displaying users.
test_cases.name: test_display_users_raises_exception

test_setup.given: UserService.fetch_all_users returns a list of users; display_users raises Exception('Display Error').
test_setup.then: Error 'Failed to retrieve users: Display Error' is logged.

test_cases.description: Test that main handles the edge case where UserService.fetch_all_users returns None.
test_cases.name: test_fetch_all_users_returns_none

test_setup.then: display_users is called with None, or an error is logged if display_users cannot handle None.

test_cases.description: Test that main handles the edge case where setup_logging raises an exception.
test_cases.name: test_setup_logging_raises_exception

test_setup.then: Program fails early; error 'Failed to retrieve users: Logging Error' is logged if possible.

test_cases.description: Test that main handles an exception when UserService instantiation fails.
test_cases.name: test_user_service_init_raises_exception

test_setup.then: Error 'Failed to retrieve users: Init Error' is logged, and no further calls (fetch_all_users or display_users) are made.
